con:configuration.scriptText:
def jsonRes = messageExchange.getResponse().contentAsString
def jsonSlurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper(); def parse = jsonSlurper.parseText(jsonRes)
def componentBundle = parse.componentBundle log.info componentBundle assert componentBundle != null
def brand = parse.componentBundle.brand log.info brand assert brand == "C"
def revenueOfficeCode = parse.componentBundle.revenueOfficeCode log.info revenueOfficeCode assert revenueOfficeCode == "MIA"
def countryCode = parse.componentBundle.countryCode log.info countryCode assert countryCode == "USA"
def bookingChannel = parse.componentBundle.bookingChannel log.info bookingChannel assert bookingChannel == "VP"
